about_the_game:
Dance Hero 2: More Jiggle is a rhythm and more game, a journey to the world of dancing and multimetauniverse of all kinds of creatures and situations.

One day, minding your own business, you receive a call from a mysterious caller, who tells you that every 12,000 years there is a dancing competition between the best dancers from the Universe, to decide which worlds will have the ability to dance and who won't. He also tells you that is is a prerecorded message. So you decide to try dancing and recording yourself doing it, in hopes of attracting fellow dancers to help you in this world-bending quest. And they come, but still you are the one who has to dance. On the bright side, everyone is cool.

Features:

  • Over 40 rhythm and twerk levels to play and replay.
  • Each level has it's own unique background!
  • Unique "bullet hell" style twerk gameplay.
  • Challenging rhythm gameplay
  • Over 50 tracks to listen to, 15 unique ones.
  • Story mode with voice actors.
  • Over 300 dances and dances moves to choreograph into one dance!
  • Over 400 characters to choose from.
  • Crew mode to combine different characters into one crew.
  • Customize the size and the clothes of the original characters.
  • Practice mode where you can just enjoy the dancing.
  • One big city with many locations to explore.

One day, minding your own business, you receive a call from a mysterious caller, who tells you that every 12,000 years there is a dancing competition between the best dancers from the Universe, to decide which worlds will have the ability to dance and who won't. He also tells you that is is a prerecorded message. So you decide to try dancing and recording yourself doing it, in hopes of attracting fellow dancers to help you in this world-bending quest. And they come, but still you are the one who has to dance. On the bright side, everyone is cool.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Big Sur
  • Processor: After 2014
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

name: Dance Hero: More Jiggle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: After 2014
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: After 2014
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: Dance Hero: More Jiggle is a Dance/Rhythm/Twerk and Customization Simulator with many unique features. Twerk through the story, hire many interesting characters to dance with, explore a huge city and even customize your main character with clothes from real-world fashion brands!
